# `watch`

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (GENERATE_COMMANDS_DOCS) -->
Watch for site deploy to finish

**Usage**

```bash
netlify watch
```

**Arguments**

- deployId - undefined

**Examples**

```bash
netlify watch
git push && netlify watch
```


<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->
